video:video.video:title: Face Lift before and after results just 8 days post surgery
video:video.video:description: Experience the transformative power of a facelift in Thailand with Azurite Medical & Wellness! Watch as our client undergoes a **SMAS facelift**, a cutting-edge procedure that tightens facial muscles, defines the jawline, and restores a youthful appearance. This treatment also includes a **neck lift** with liposuction to reduce fat tissue and tighten the neck area for a sleek, rejuvenated look. In this video, we showcase **before-and-after results just 8 days post-surgery**, highlighting the incredible recovery and stunning transformation. Discover why Azurite is a trusted name in cosmetic surgery, offering state-of-the-art facilities, expert surgeons, and personalized care in Bangkok. If you're considering a facelift or curious about the latest advancements in cosmetic procedures, this video is a must-watch. Join us to see how Azurite helps clients achieve natural, youthful results with confidence!
